Name: Giuseppe's Habit
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Express oils from and drop each of the two lemon zests into the shaker.
Add other ingredients and REGAL SHAKE with ice.
Review: An intriguing drink that combines hazelnut, orange, apple, aniseed and peppermint.
History: Created in 2002 by Leon Stokes at Zinc Bar & Grill, Birmingham, England.
